channel.title: Offtopic - SMR Forums
channel.description: Topics in the 'Offtopic' category For discussions that don’t fit well into the other categories.

item.title: Unban from Discord
item.dc:creator: @t1ggy T1ggy
item.description:
@t1ggy wrote:

Can any Mod Unban me from the Discord ?
I got banned because i was using a cracked Version but now i got the Official Version from Steam so it would be nice to Unban me. My Discord Name is t1ggy#3633.

If you want any proof that i got the game let me know.

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic

item.title: Banned on discord
item.dc:creator: @bobmaster_1000 Bobmaster 1000
item.description:
@bobmaster_1000 wrote:

i got banned forthe reason “Piracy isn’t tolerated here, just like on the main Satisfactory discord. Please support the devs. Send proof of purchase of the game and we will consider an unban.” but i never said i pirated the game i said “does it work for a cracked version” never saying that i have a cracked/pirated version if you could unban me that would be great.

Posts: 3

Participants: 2

Read full topic

item.title: This is funny -_-
item.dc:creator: @Xiarno_Giveaway Xiarno
item.description:
@Xiarno_Giveaway wrote:

Funny how in the Discord, they say “Hey, if you cracked the game, tag a moderator so they can help you because some special stuff need to be done for it to work”, but instead of helping you, they just ban you outright with no way of even trying to explain because you are ban indefinitely.
Like, it’s literally in their FAQ “If you are running a cracked version of the game - Ping a @Moderator for instructions (SML needs to be modified)”. Don’t fucking lie about it.

Atleast ban for some days, months or whatever because this is bullshit.

PS

If you said it’s my fault for cracking the game, first of all, yes I did crack the game but with the intent to not use the Epic Launcher and I was waiting to buy it on Steam, so in my mind I already bought it because that’s what I’m going to do. Second of all, I could’ve just buyed it & then not get banned. But now that I’m banned forever, even if I buy it I can’t come back so this is pure bullshit.

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic
